title: anyone else find it dumb how you cant earn blue essences?
body: i find it so money hungry they got rid of blue essences you get per game, i think this whole rank up is a scheme to make people buy champs which is really sad.

replies.body: I mean yeah but back in the old days it would be years before you played some champions

I think it's easier to get champs in this system then back in the day. When they got rid of weekend bonus ip the struggle was real. Now that im levelling a smurf i've already unlocked a small champion pool i can play in ranked and im only level 29. What i wish, is that i can gift be, becacuse i've got like 800k

It's easy if you start out new, I was level 24 when new season started, I'm level 45 and still can't play ranked because of lack of champions and I've got under 1k BE. It's a bad system, I also am only able to get champions by luck of draw, I don't really get a choice in the champs I buy.

You never gained blue essence per game, in the history of LoL.

You used to gain IP per game, don't confuse systems.

Call a spade a spade, not a shovel.

IP/ Blue essence same thing, only can be used for buying champs. 

idk just seems stupid
Lmao you only have too much because you're not a new player.
